thread.title: BRIEF-Lukasz Bartczak appointed IDH's temporary chairman of management
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Lukasz Bartczak appointed IDH's temporary chairman of management

title: BRIEF-Lukasz Bartczak appointed IDH's temporary chairman of management
text:
BRIEF-Lukasz Bartczak appointed IDH's temporary chairman of management Sept 16 
Sept 16 IDH SA 
* Its supervisory board delegated Lukasz Bartczak to perform duties of company's chairman of management board for three months as of Sept. 16 
* Lukasz Bartczak is member of IDH's supervisory board Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters 
Thomson Reuters is the world's largest international multimedia news agency, providing investing news , world news , business news , technology news , headline news, small business news , news alerts, personal finance , stock market , and mutual funds information available on Reuters.com, video , mobile , and interactive television platforms. Thomson Reuters journalists are subject to an Editorial Handbook which requires fair presentation and disclosure of relevant interests.
